attributes.action: Keep the weekly bin collections!  Stop the fortnightly cost cutting 'rubbish'!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to try and keep the weekly bin collections by the local councils and to stop the councils cost cutting exercise; even though their so called research said that there would be adverse effects to public health.  What about quality of life?  
Do you want to walk do the street with the stench of decaying rubbish?

They are telling us to wrap up our waste to a greater degree.  What are we supposed to wrap up the rubbish with?  Plastic?  Surely that creates more waste and is non-biodegradable.  Please sign and make the government and local councils see sense.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
